attributes.action:
End all conflict and wars on foreign countries.
People want peace
attributes.additional_details:
We need to end all conflict with other nations to be a mature nation who accepts the differences of different nations and cultures.
You cannot defeat an "enemy" who is created from violence by using violence.
It is a vicious circle that is bringing terror to our cities.
This would not happen if these illegal wars for oil and power never happened.
This is our governments fault.
This kind of foreign policy is creating hate towards us, only making the threat of terror worse.
Our leaders know this and it needs to stop.
attributes.background:
we need to end this vicious so called "war on terror"
It is a total scam and people are being manipulated into believing it.
This war on terror only creates enemies and can NEVER be won.
